long_description: Haul your gear easily with the weatherproof Timbuk2 Cog pannier. It attaches quickly to your bike for your commute while a removable shoulder strap makes it just as easy to carry on foot. Exterior is built to last with rugged fabric and heavy-duty stitching; weatherproof fabric helps keep contents dry in wet weather and makes any clean up a breeze. Oversized top flap accommodates expanding volumes and secures with side-release buckle; waterproof flap helps keep contents dry. Fully padded laptop sleeve and additional slip pocket for tablet keep your electronics protected while still leaving the roomy main compartment available for clothes or shoes. External zip compartment keeps essentials secure and within easy reach. Fast clip attachment system makes the transition from bike to office a snap; removable, adjustable padded shoulder strap helps ease the load when you're on foot. Timbuk2 Cog pannier features a bike light attachment loop for improved visibility in low light.
short_description: Haul your gear easily with the weatherproof Timbuk2 Cog pannier. It attaches quickly to your bike for your commute while a removable shoulder strap makes it just as easy to carry on foot.
